top.title: What could happen if the US strikes Iran? Here are seven scenarios
top.summary: From regime change to retaliation, the BBC's Frank Gardner outlines possible outcomes of US strikes on Iran.

top.title: Nicki Minaj calls herself Trump's 'number one fan' and shows off gold card visa
top.summary: The Trinidadian-American rapper held hands on stage with the US President, amid ICE protests.

top.title: Talks ramp up to avert US government shutdown after Minneapolis shooting
top.summary: Democrats are pushing to remove funding for the Department of Homeland Security unless new measures are implemented.

top.title: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns
top.summary: The ASA upheld complaints that Coinbase's adverts trivialised the risks of investing in cryptocurrency.

top.title: Driverless taxis set to launch in UK as soon as September
top.summary: Waymo has laid out plans for a robotaxi service in London with a pilot scheme due to begin in April.

top.title: Tesla cuts car models in shift to robots and AI
top.summary: Multi-billionaire Elon Musk's electric car maker also said its annual revenue had fallen for the first time.

title.#text: PopSockets added a wallet to its folding kickstand grip
There won’t be a Nothing Phone 4 this year
